SELECT m.* FROM v_member m LEFT JOIN v_wx_user wu ON m.wx_user_id = wu.id WHERE m.id = 1 AND wu.`status` = 1 AND wu.openid = #{openId};

SELECT m.* FROM v_member m LEFT JOIN v_merchant me ON m.merchant_id = me.id LEFT JOIN v_store s ON s.merchant_id = me.id WHERE m.`status` = 1 AND me.`status` = 1 AND s.`status` = 1 AND m.mobile = #{mobile} AND s.storeNo = #{storeNo}
